key_risks: Accounting errors leading to significant stock price decline
Regulatory scrutiny from evolving data privacy regulations
Integration challenges from aggressive acquisition strategy
Client concentration risk with major clients like Microsoft and Coca-Cola
High competition in the marketing industry
Economic sensitivity tied to advertising budgets
controversies: Lawsuit against Richard Oh alleging fraud
Potential shareholder lawsuits following financial statement errors

sources.title: Stagwell closes deal to combine with MDC Partners - Axios
sources.snippet: Stagwell, a D.C.-headquartered marketing services agency, said Monday it closed a deal to combine with MDC Partners, a global ad holding company based in New York. Why it matters: It's the largest transaction in the advertising sector so far this year. The combined company is expected to have revenues of over $2 billion in 2021, making it one of the top 10 largest ad holding groups in the world.
